turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yeah, good evening my assistant. Please I want you to order some pizzas for me from Bella Luna three large thin crust pizzas with chicken barbecue. Yes, three large thin crust pizzas with meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: order some pizzas from Bella Luna, sure i can do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so that 3 large thin crust pizza with meat lover.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to 72 dollars, do you me to put that order through for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please help me do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it is your local one closest to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, I'll go there. Thank you.
